participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and driven, always looking for ways to improve and learn.
participant_1.background: My pets are a constant source of comfort and love. I am bipolar. I wish I could fly my model airplane without being afraid of crashing it. I've had my cards read a couple of times. I like to listen to upbeat music to get pumped up before I race my go kart.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, balancing a structured job with artistic endeavors.
participant_2.background: I'm a software engineer, but my passion is writing. My favorite musician is Bruno Mars. I have two smartphones. I love my pets because they are always there to greet me when I come home from work. I spent a few hours yesterday planning my next garden project.

content.text: Hello there! I'm a software engineer too. What kind of software do you engineer?
Hi there! I build software for websites and apps. How about you?
I work in a large corporation and I build software that helps the company manage their inventory.
Cool! I always wanted to work for a large corporation but I'm afraid of being micromanaged.
It's not that bad. I have a lot of freedom to work on my own projects and there are a lot of opportunities to learn new things.
That's good to hear. I'm a musician too and I write songs in my free time.
That's so cool! What kind of music do you write?
I write pop music and I'm trying to get my music heard by as many people as possible.
I'm sure you'll make it! I'm rooting for you!
